name: Portal Fish: Back to Androselo
description:
Main Story

Our character is Androselo's most famous explorer. He traveled using the famous portal fish used in his galaxy while discovering new galaxies and planets. However, the UFO he used had an accident and the portal fish were scattered into space. Now what our explorer has to do is find the five sacred fish that were scattered and bring them back to the UFO. In this way, the fish will be able to do their job again and take our explorer back to his galaxy.

Instructions

Press F11 if your browser does not show minimap's top.

Controlling the player - Use Mouse Pointer

The aim is to collect the 5 fish on the map and bring them to the center.

Team

  • Ogulcan Topsakal(Developer)
  • Ertugrul Enes Ozgen(Developer)
  • Selim Yilmaz(Art/Graphic Designer)

Unity Play
